member.name: T:Generic.Math.ExpressionUtil
member.summary: General purpose Expression utilities

member.name: M:Generic.Math.ExpressionUtil.CreateExpression``2(System.Func{System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression})
member.summary: Create a function delegate representing a unary operation

member.name: M:Generic.Math.ExpressionUtil.CreateExpression``3(System.Func{System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression})
member.summary: Create a function delegate representing a binary operation

member.name: M:Generic.Math.ExpressionUtil.CreateExpression``3(System.Func{System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a function delegate representing a binary operation
member.param: If no matching operation is possible, attempt to convert TArg1 and TArg2 to TResult for a match? For example, there is no "decimal operator /(decimal, int)", but by converting TArg2 (int) to TResult (decimal) a match is found.

member.name: T:Generic.Math.GenericMath
member.summary: The GenericMath class provides easy access to the standard operators (addition, etc) for generic types, using type inference to simplify usage.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.Negate``1(``0)
member.summary: Evaluates unary negation (-) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.Not``1(``0)
member.summary: Evaluates bitwise not (~) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.Or``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates bitwise or (|) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.And``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates bitwise and (&) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.Xor``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates bitwise xor (^) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.Convert``2(``0)
member.summary: Performs a conversion between the given types; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide a suitable cast, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this cast.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.Add``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates binary addition (+) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.AddAlternative``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Evaluates binary addition (+) for the given type(s); this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.Subtract``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates binary subtraction (-) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.SubtractAlternative``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Evaluates binary subtraction(-) for the given type(s); this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.Multiply``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates binary multiplication (*) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.MultiplyAlternative``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Evaluates binary multiplication (*) for the given type(s); this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.Divide``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates binary division (/) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.DivideAlternative``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Evaluates binary division (/) for the given type(s); this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.Equal``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates binary equality (==) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.NotEqual``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates binary inequality (!=) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.GreaterThan``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates binary greater-than (>) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.LessThan``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates binary less-than (<) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.GreaterThanOrEqual``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates binary greater-than-on-eqauls (>=) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.LessThanOrEqual``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Evaluates binary less-than-or-equal (<=) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: M:Generic.Math.GenericMath.DivideInt32``1(``0,System.Int32)
member.summary: Evaluates integer division (/) for the given type; this will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.
member.remarks: This operation is particularly useful for computing averages and similar aggregates.

member.name: T:Generic.Math.GenericMath`2
member.summary: Provides standard operators (such as addition) that operate over operands of different types. For operators, the return type is assumed to match the first operand.

member.name: P:Generic.Math.GenericMath`2.Convert
member.summary: Returns a delegate to convert a value between two types; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide a suitable cast, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this cast.

member.name: P:Generic.Math.GenericMath`2.Add
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary addition (+) for the given types; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Generic.Math.GenericMath`2.Subtract
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary subtraction (-) for the given types; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Generic.Math.GenericMath`2.Multiply
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary multiplication (*) for the given types; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Generic.Math.GenericMath`2.Divide
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary division (/) for the given types; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: T:Generic.Math.GenericMath`1
member.summary: Provides standard operators (such as addition) over a single type

member.name: P:Generic.Math.GenericMath`1.Zero
member.summary: Returns the zero value for value-types (even full Nullable<TInner>) - or null for reference types
